headline.main: GOVERNMENT BONDS UP ON HEAVY BUYING; New Peaks for 1931 Reached on Stock Exchange--Gains Are 1-32 to 8-32 Point. CORPORATION ISSUES DROP Rails Lose Ground, Industrials Are Depressed--Foreign Loans Irregular for Day.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, May 15.--Montevideo news papers are vigorously protesting against continuation of Argentina's alleged policy of making Montevideo the dumping ground for all of its undesirables.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, May 15.--Montevideo news papers are vigorously protesting against continuation of Argentina's alleged policy of making Montevideo the dumping ground for all of its undesirables.

docs.snippet: MONTIVIDEO, May 16.--A hundred or more members of an international white slave gang who are seeking to settle in Montevideo are to be intrened at the quarantine station on Flores Island, off the Uruguayan Coast, according to treliable reports in...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTIVIDEO, May 16.--A hundred or more members of an international white slave gang who are seeking to settle in Montevideo are to be intrened at the quarantine station on Flores Island, off the Uruguayan Coast, according to treliable reports in official circles, where it is said that President Terra will sign a decree to that effect early next week.
docs.abstract: Gang, deported by Argentina, barred by Uruguay
